summary: This mod is a conversion of Sexy Evening by gekkou1992 to the CHSBHC body.
descriptionHtml:
------------------------[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2u53ml4.jpg[/IMG]------------------------
--------[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/28mck7r.jpg[/IMG]--------

--------[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/8z0ff7.jpg[/IMG]--------

This mod is a conversion of Sexy Evening by gekkou1992 to the CHSBHC body.

Additional retexture - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48353

How to get:console "help sexyeveningdress" => find dress and boots => "player.additem"
My recommendation : Radient Raiment => Endarie => "additem dress and boots" => buy!

------------------------[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2hpskkp.jpg[/IMG]------------------------
Thanks to Bethesda for an amazing game
Thanks to The Nexus for hosting this mod
Sexy Evening Dress for UNPB-BBP by gekkou1992
Credits and permissions:
